"},{"type":"element","tag":"code","props":{"className":""},"children":[{"type":"text","value":"router-link"}]},{"type":"text","value":". What this means, is if the link is in view, Gridsome will make the request in the background and grab all that data for the user. This way, when the user clicks the link, the transition is almost instantaneous.
